technology: There were no technical difficulties during the conversation.
cur_neg_affect: The participant does not express much negative affect about the pandemic in the present, but does mention that she is still getting all of her vaccines.
past_neg_affect: The participant expresses some negative affect when recalling the past, mentioning that she was a little skeptical about the vaccine at first.
communal_orientation: The participant engages in conversation and asks questions, but does not give affirmations or seem entirely engaged.
engagement: The participant is engaged in the conversation and tries to keep it going.
defensiveness: The participant is not at all defensive in justifying their beliefs/perspective.

questions.transcript: What was your experience like with vaccination?

vaccine_importance: The participant seems to believe that vaccines are very important, as she gets all of her vaccines and plans to continue to do so.
booster_importance: The participant seems to believe that boosters are very important, as she gets all of her vaccines and plans to continue to do so.
cognitive_complexity: The participant demonstrates a moderate amount of cognitive complexity, considering different perspectives and recognizing nuance in the conversation.
general_notes: The participant had COVID in between the second dose and the booster.
